mapper.update: update ujcms_message_board set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id_ = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reply_user_id_ = #{replyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id_ = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title_ = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_ = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reply_date_ = #{replyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, place_ = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_ = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname_ = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_ = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_ = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_ = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession_ = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type_ = #{userType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, open_ = #{open,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, ip_ = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, replied_ = #{replied,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, recommended_ = #{recommended,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, status_ = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, text_ = #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, reply_text_ = #{replyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_message_board (id_, site_id_, user_id_, reply_user_id_, type_id_, title_, created_, reply_date_, place_, contact_, nickname_, phone_, email_, address_, profession_, user_type_, open_, ip_, replied_, recommended_, status_, text_, reply_text_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{replyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{open,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replied,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{recommended,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{replyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.site_id_, t.user_id_, t.reply_user_id_, t.type_id_, t.title_, t.created_, t.reply_date_, t.place_, t.contact_, t.nickname_, t.phone_, t.email_, t.address_, t.profession_, t.user_type_, t.open_, t.ip_, t.replied_, t.recommended_, t.status_, t.text_, t.reply_text_
